message.1:
It seems that you are not logged in!
Simply login with osu! and you can start voting/nominating immediately!
message.2:
You may login on discord in addition as well after, but it is not required to vote/nominate.
Discord login is required for staff members working on MCA/AYIM.

login.authOsu: click here to authenticate with osu!
login.authDiscord: click here to authenticate with discord

comments.name: COMMENTS
comments.info: All comments become public after this MCA's results are out! You can submit your own comments until then.

message.1: Mapper's Choice Awards is back for round 4 in 2019! This is a voting event where all mappers/modders can nominate and vote what they think is the best map/mapper for each category!
message.2: Our intention is to give a new perspective on the best maps of 2019 through the eyes of the mapping community in comparison to Community Choice!
message.3: This year, we have gone full-on with a website so that we can make it as easy as possible for eligible voters to nominate and vote now!
message.4: We hope as many participants as possible take part in this event!

marathon.name: Marathon
marathon.description: The best set with 5+ minute drain time.

hitsounding.name: Hitsounding
hitsounding.description: The best bells and whistles out there.

collab.name: Collab
collab.description: The best set with 2+ mappers creating the top difficulty.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: The best set with the top difficulty lower than an insane.

highBPM.name: High BPM
highBPM.description: The best set with atypical spaced streams or high singletap strain.

smallCircles.name: Small Circles
smallCircles.description: The best set with top difficulties using circle size 5 or smaller.

heavy13.name: 1/3 Heavy
heavy13.description: The best set with top difficulties using lots of purple ticks.

throwback.name: Throwback
throwback.description: The best set with a style of the old.
